Title: Ben 10: Race Against Time
Writer: Man of Action (creator), Tom Pugsley (story), Greg Klein (story), Mitch Watson, Duncan Rouleau (creator), Joe Casey (creator), Joe Kelly (creator), Steven T. Seagle (creator)
Actors: Graham Phillips, Christien Anholt, Haley Ramm, Beth Littleford
Plot: Ben Tennyson returns home from summer vacation only to discover that a rapidly aging alien criminal named, Eon, is planning to use an ancient alien artifact to destroy Bellwood.
